title: European Rival to Robinhood, Trade Republic, Raises $900 Million at $5 Billion Valuation
sub_head: The investment makes Trade Republic one of the most highly valued private financial-technology companies in Europe
body:
European securities-trading platform Trade Republic has raised $900 million as it seeks to emulate the success of U.S. company Robinhood Markets Inc. in becoming the favored app for younger traders.
The Berlin-based company said Thursday that the Series C funding round was led by U.S. venture-capital firm Sequoia Capital and valued it at more than $5 billion. The investment makes Trade Republic one of the most highly valued private financial-technology companies in Europe.
